title: Leona Jungle actually works
body:
Well, it does for me, and i feel like i actually not seeing someting because she must have some negative stuff about playing her in the jungle. 
She has decent clear speed, many different itemization posibilities, its a tank with decent dmg and lots of cc, and if someone wants to counterjungle/invade you they wont be able to kill you because of her innate tankyness. Mobility/ganks pre-6 is actually some problems, but so does champs like warwick, fiddle, etc and are pretty decent.

P.S. : THIS IS BRONZE/SILVER FEEDBACK SO I WOULD ACTUALLY LOVE TO HEAR SOME GOOD ADVICE FROM THE PROS HERE.

replies.body:
[Done it.](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/tips-tricks/4kLnaNMB-so-ive-been-playing-leona-lately)

May remake it with Cinderhulk instead.
Nice! Cinderhulk replaces sunfire cape wich is so cool since you can get an extra ad or tanky item.

Start with Q, then W, then E.
The max order should be R,W,E,Q for tankyness. 
Start gromp.
Only problem with her in the jungle is slow clear speeds since her passive requires your team to trigger. But I did try it and the ganks are stupidly powerful.

{{item:3725}} {{item:3153}} (or hydra) and then a few tank items.

Jungle Leona is a thing, and semi-popular. It's meta sheep who keep Leona bot lane, forcing her to be a support when in reality... she's a tank. Who supports. But also a tank. And tanks can do... tank stuff that tanks... uh, do.
